forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Thunder possible. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Thunder possible. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.
